name: Lule Kaine - Quiet Volcanoes LP
description:
Lule Kaine - Quiet Volcanoes 

1-Paradox 
2-Quasi 
3-La Programma 101 
4-Solid Ground 
5-All the hearts of strangers 
6-Nine 
7-Awaking 
8-Dellschau 

LP 12" - Black vinyl 140g -  Cover UV Glossy print 
Edition of 150

Written and performed by: 
Luigi Pugliano: guitar, synth, bass, effects, programming, samples 
Alessandro Ripandelli: guitar, bass, synth, effects

released 17 November 2012 
Produced by Lule Kaine 
Recorded, mixed by Marco Milanesio at 
O.F.F. Recording Studio - Turin, Italy 
between winter 2011 /spring 2012 
Mastering by Fausto Balbo autumn 2012 
Artwork by Luigi Pugliano 

Released by: Waste Isolation Records 
Release/catalogue number: wir002 
Release date: Nov 17, 2012

name: Lule Kaine - Radiations from futurist furniture CD
description:
"Radiations from futurist furniture" 2007  LULE KAINE/CHEW Z 

Cd Art-Digipack, Limited Edition 333 numbered copies
7 tracks, 36 mins

1. Can D vs Chew Z 
2. Radiations from futurist furniture 
3. Klaus 
4. Generator mount 
5 .Atonal 
6. Not on,not hot or doct not toc toc 
7. Genocide Morning 

Recorded in 6 days in october 2006.
Direct taken & Overdubs on UST Recording Station Villa Minozzo (RE) - Italy

released 16 December 2007
Edited By, Mastered By – Marco Milanesio
Mixed By – Olivier Manchion, Simone Filippi
Producer [Artistic] – Olivier Manchion
Recorded By – Simone Filippi
Production: Lule Kaine
Artwork: Luigi Pugliano

name: Lule Kaine / Lule Kaine CD
description:
"Lule kaine" Mini Album 2004 / WIR001

CD Jewel box Limited Edition 500 copies.
6 tracks, 32 mins

1. Tuner
2. Shine den
3. Mr. Papillon
4. Danser après l'hiver
5. D-river
6. Epoch of drunk universe (riding pulsar in
    mid-tone)


Direct taken in 3 different sessions from december 2003 to march 2004
released 04 April 2004
Recording, Mixing and Mastering by Max Alfieri at Sub Mix Pro Studio - Torino, Italy
Production: Lule Kaine
Artwork: Luigi Pugliano
